name: problem-set-8_2
description: ## Directions Create a `UserCard` component. * The component should render a styled user card. * The component should take a `userId` as props. * Upon mounting, the component should make a fetch request to `https://reqres.in/api/users/{userId}`. Then it should display the following user data:   * email   * first_name   * last_name   * avatar * While waiting for a response, (as in, when the component first mounts) the card should display `"Loading..."` for each of these fields.
